str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am awake (in the night), watch, (b) I am watchful, on the alert, vigilant. From egeiro; to keep awake, i.e. Watch.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural

str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
